greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k), 1 <= k <= n, is the number of non-degenerate fanout-free Boolean functions of n variables having AND rank k.
comment: Also the Bell transform of A225170. For the definition of the Bell transform see A264428. - _Peter Luschny_, Jan 29 2016
link: J. P. Hayes, Enumeration of fanout-free Boolean functions, J. ACM, 23 (1976), 700-709.
Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
mathematica: BellMatrix[f_Function, len_] := With[{t = Array[f, len, 0]}, Table[BellY[n, k, t], {n, 0, len - 1}, {k, 0, len - 1}]];
Table[M[[n, k]], {n, 2, rows}, {k, 2, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 24 2018, after _Peter Luschny_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 30 2013
